author: Topcop999
title: Great, just great!
review:
Why wouldn't you get this set?...

Pros

  • All letters of the alphabet.
  • Few symbols.
  • A plate with a keyring attached.

Cons

  • Lego store/online exclusive
  • You may not have enough of each letters for what you want to spell out.

...You sadly can't get this set any more but you can get similar ones so definitely get one if you can!


Current similar set: http://www.brickset.com/detail/?set=850425-1.
